snippet: Their 2014 budget is a strong counterweight to the reckless House proposals from Paul Ryan.
abstract: Editorial praises Senate Democrats for passing their first budget in four years; holds budget has fair mix of spending cuts and increased revenue that represent solid rebuttal to absolute dogma among House Republicans.
lead_paragraph: Their 2014 budget is a strong counterweight to the reckless House proposals from Paul Ryan.

headline.seo: Senate Democrats Finally Take a Stand
headline.main: Senate Democrats Finally Take a Stand
headline.print_headline: Senate Democrats Finally Take a Stand
